name: Galva
description: Galva are diminutive and innocuous mammalian species native to Saleucami. They travel in large herds of up to one hundred individuals, feeding off of desert lichens and moss as they migrate across the planet's oppressively hot equatorial regions. Galva are often hunted for their skins, which can be tanned into a supple leather that has grown increasingly popular (any undamaged hide goes for 1000 credits, rarity 6). As a result, many of the largest galva hers have been depleted by overhunting.

name: Ambrae Environmental Security Guard
description: add description

name: Bridge Guard
description: add description

name: Corellian Bloodhound
description: Corellian bloudhounds are often kept as pets and guard animals, though packs of wild bloodhounds occasionally roam in areas where they've been transplanted. Unlike most canids, they rarely bark or yelp. When they do bark, however, the vocalization has a whisper-like quality. This behaviour is instinctual, as Corellian bloodhounds in the wild rely on stealth to ambush their prey. At up to one meter in length, Corellian blooodhounds are slim and agile, relying on stealth and speed rather than brute strength to take down prey. A fine coat of tiny quills covers their body, and their head features an oversized snout to aid in scenting prety, and a mouth lined with sharp, dagger-like teeth.

abilities.name: Scent
abilities.description: Add :boost::boost: to Survival checks made to track prey.

name: Koochoo, ASP-Series Labor Droid
description: Koochoo (Huttese for “idiot” or “moron”) is Krezo's labor droid. Krezo has had Koochoo's programming modified, making the droid completely loyal and incapable of intentionally causing harm to its master. This does not apply to others, and Krezo is happy to use Koochoo to keep enemies at bay while he escapes. Like other ASP-series labour droids, Koochoo is only capable fo speaking two words: “Affirmative” and “Negative”, both spoken in very mechanical Huttese.

name: Mantellian Flutterplume
description: Despite their florid name, flutterplumes are one of Ord Mantell's most dangerous scavengers. Preferring to hunt wastes and Scraplands from on high, these creatures can often be seen gliding on thermal currents in the distance in flocks of three or four. Their eyesight is quite acute, and they are always hungry.

name: Slaver Guard
description: The slaver guards in Rusty Reach have been selected from some of the vilest scum on Ord Mantell. As long as they're being paid, they obey any order Gerk gives them, no matter how demeaning or malicious it is. The guards come from various species and genders, and there is no specific symbol or uniform to unite them.

name: Sorority Courtier
description: Many of the guests, hangers-on, and sycophants in the Pirate Queen's court are kept around for amusement's sake.

name: Sorority Palace Guard
description: The pirates who act as guards inside the Queen's palace are experienced troops of a variety of species and genders. They don't wear specific uniforms, though most of them wear heavy clothing. The guards take their jobs seriously, but are pirates at heart - many of them are bored and hope they can go back to doing what they enjoy most: namely, taking prizes in space. This makes them complacent and sloppy.

name: Sorority Crew
description: add description

name: Sorority Defender
description: add description

name: Sorority Engineer
description: add description

name: Sorority Fighter Jockey
description: add description

name: Sorority Kill Team Member
description: add description

name: Sorority Palace Guard
description: add description

name: Sorority Pirate
description: add description

name: Sorority Pirate Queensguard
description: add description

name: Sorority Saboteur
description: add description

name: Nuuno
description: A massive, omnivorous crustacean.

name: Venlana Sipal, Consortium Underboss
description: Venlana Sipal is a Saleucamian native descended from the original Pantoran colonists. She wears a mask of polite professionalism at all times, but her true nature is much more sinister. Ambitions and merciless, she does anything to ensure her own advancement. Her skin is blue and her hair a dark shade of blue-black. She generally dresses in conservative suits.

name: Thaelo
description: Simian predators that dwell in the jungle trees common to Saleucami's many craters.

abilities.name: Excellent Climber
abilities.description: Once per game session, the character may reroll any one Athletics check made when climbing

name: Consortium Starfighter Pilot
description: Add description.

name: Fleet Officer
description: Add description.

name: Gerk, Houk Supervisor
description: Gerk is the biggest and the strongest of the slavers, so naturally, he's in charge. It's his responsibility to negotiate with scrap buyers and to replenish the workforce when too many slaves die. While intelligent for a Houk, Gerk often lets his cruelty get the better of him.

name: Graf Lind, Former Pirate
description: Graf is a human male in his fifties, though his lifestyle has ages him prematurely. His hair is long, gray, and unkempt, and his blue eyes are dull - unless he's interested in something. His cheap prosthetic leg - all he coudl affford following the tender mercy of the Veiled Sorority - makes him walk with a noticeable limp, and often uses a polishes bubse wood cane for support. Graf hsd largely given up on life, whether he admits ir ot not, and has decided to drink himself to death. Despite this, he fantasizes about returning to the Sorority someday, for he believes the best years of his life were spent there.

name: Oake, Veteran Clone Trooper
description: Add description.

abilities.name: Hard of Hearing
abilities.description: Add :setback: when attempting a Perception check based on auditory clues

name: Jayk, Veteran Clone Trooper
description: Add description.

name: Tojo, Veteran Clone Trooper
description: Add description.

abilities.name: Poor Memory
abilities.description: Has difficulty remembering specific details, and must succeed at an :average: Vigilance check to recall anything important.

name: Rafe, Veteran Clone Trooper
description: Add description.

name: JR-12, Independent Security Contractor
description: JR-12 is an old security droid who lost its master at least fifty years ago. Since then, it has worked as a bounty hunter, bodyguard, bouncer and security guard - sometimes all four at once -  and has become recognized thoughout Morro Spaceport as one of the more reliable security contractors available. LIke that of all security droids in this series, JR-12's humanoid frame is tall and gangly, and its metallic skin is coated in a scratched-up camouflage paint job. Though blunt, is it honest to a fault and hardworking.

name: Jyd Renyr, Arena Manager
description: Add description.

name: Krash, Sorority Kill Team Leader
description: Krash is a large and imposing Barabel shockboxer who washed out after a lost bout that nearly killed him. Disgraced, he turned to drink and spice until he met with a Sorority recuiter in the cantina. He has since recovered from his shame and addiction, and dedicates himself to the Sorority's business on Saleucami.

name: Lathe, Sorority Slicer
description: Lathe is one of the Sorority's best slicers on Saleucami. She's been assigned to monitor the planet's SororiNet node, and the job couldn't suit her better. Though rarily seen outside the confines of her apartment in Taleucema, Lather emerges from time to time to replenish her supply of Booster Blue. She is a short, slight wisp of a human woman in her early twenties, with short-cropped red hair and hazel eyes.

name: Mandi, Revah's Bodyguard
description: Mandi is the only member of the Sorority on Saleucami who knows that Revah is not the real Pirate Queen. She possesses ambitions of her own, however, and these include engineering Revah's capture or death so that she can claim her mask on Saleucami. To this end, Mandi ensured thatg Krezo Wasanti knew the name of the pirate base's location when she sold him a large amount of Consortium plunder.

name: Mantellian Savrip
description: Though Ord Mantell is home to millions of unique species, the most notable of them is the Savrip. Though Savrips have long been considered semi-sentient by xenobiologists from the Core Worlds, their perceived intellect remains a contentious subject. To the people of Ord Mantell, however, there is no doubt that Savrips are cunning, intelligent, and - most of all - dangerous. Nearly four meters tall when standing fully erect, Savrips move in a hunched posture that disguises their height while exaggerating their already prodigious bulk. Their nexks are long and topped by snake-like heads, and their muscular arms drag upon the ground. Though primitive, Savrips prefer to wear clothing, and many wield large clubs as weapons.

abilities.name: Poisonous Bite
abilities.description: Anyone bitten by a Savrip must succeed at an Average (:average:) Resilience check or lose his free maneuver for five rounds.

name: Scrap Nomad
description: Evun, Alva, and Theel.

name: Sorority Bodyguard
description: Though the bodyguard is ostensibly present on behalf of the Queen to protect Micael Torval, he is actually there to ensure Micael remains loyal. He is also under orders to kill Torval should the need ever arise. The bodyguard is a male human who dresses in casual, yet functional, clothing and carries a blaster pistol in a concealed holster.

name: Nuuno
description: A massive, omnivorous crustacean.

name: Thaelo
description: Simian predators that dwell in the jungle trees common to Saleucami's many craters.

abilities.name: Poisonous Bite
abilities.description: Anyone bitten by a Savrip must succeed at an Average (:average:) Resilience check or lose his free maneuver for five rounds.

name: Illo Vandin, Herglic Crime Lord
description: Illo Vardin is a career gambler who made his fortune on Ord Mantell. Born on the Herglic world of Giju, he emigrated at an early age. He spent most of his formative years plying the Outer Rim's hyperspace lanes as part of a smuggler's crew. When the smuggler's ship was repossessed by an angry cruie lord, Illo found himself on Ord Mantell. Like most Herglics, Illo is tall and broad, with deep grey skin. He dresses in well-made clothing that mimics fashions popular with Worlport's gamblers, and he always wears a short cape made of black shimmersilk. He projects a calm and friendly demeanor to guests and friends, but behind this mask he is a cold, calculating, and suspicious businessman. When speaking, Illo tends to ask rhetorical questions of those around him, and is amused when individuals insist on answering them.

name: Micael Torval, Professional Sabacc Player
description: micael Torval wa born on the Inner Rim world of Taanab to a wealthy family. Shortly after coming of age, he attended university on Coruscant, but the stale predictability of classes and his parents' conservative expectations drive him to strike out on his own. As he traveled the galaxy, avoiding the stream of bounty hunters sent looking for him, he grew increasingly addicted to gambling. Fortunately, he had a knack for sabacc. Much of his success stemmed from his latent Force abilities, which even he is unaware of. Though he eventually settled down on Ord Mantell, Micael doesn't intend to remain there for much longer. He had hoped to profit from his current mistress' affection before moving on. Unfortunately, he knows too much for the Queen to be truly comfortable with his survival outside of her purview. Micael is a handsome man with black hair and blue eyes who looks much younger than his forty-two years. He dresses in fashionable clothes, and though not a fighter, he carries at least two holdout blasters. He is incredibly charming, and has little trouble using his talents to further his own ends.

abilities.name: Awe-Inspiring
abilities.description: Noira is such an awe-inspiring figure that anyone attempting to attack her suffers a :setback: to their check unless they spend a Destiny Point.  Use of the Destiny Point for this purpose makes the character in question immune from this ability.

name: Revah, Decoy Pirate Queen
gear: Sorority Mask (Upgrades all Deception skill checks made to disguise the wearer once; removes up to :setback::setback: added to all Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision)

name: Ryale Wei, Majordomo
description: Ryale Wei has ably served the Veiled Sorority for most of her life. Though she's always aspired to assume the role of Pirate Queen eventually, she takes some comfort in being a lotal second-in-command. She firmly believes that most of the Queen's decisions are actually hers anyway, and she enjoys taking credit for the Queen's actions. Ryale is a female human in her middle years, with platinum hair and golden eyes. She's vain to a fault, and has used regenerative treatments to maintain her youthful appearance for many years now. Aside from her extreme vanity, she's also overconfident. Even if confronted with violence, Ryale doesn't fight back. She prefers to guarantee her safety through surrender and delaying tactics.

name: Savrip Guards
description: The Queen keeps two Savrip guards, Kel and Tur, near her throne at all times. The two have been raised from birth to serve the Sorority, and they will gladly die for their Queen. The Queen uses the two Savrips to strike fear into the hearts of her subordinates and enemies. Kel and Tur wear fine, custom-made armour, and each one wields a huge spiked mace crafted from a black, nonreflective alloy.

name: Venlana Sipal, Consortium Underboss
description: Venlana Sipal is a Saleucamian native descended from the original Pantoran colonists. She wears a mask of polite professionalism at all times, but her true nature is much more sinister. Ambitions and merciless, she does anything to ensure her own advancement. Her skin is blue and her hair a dark shade of blue-black. She generally dresses in conservative suits.

abilities.name: Squad Leader
abilities.description: Spend a maneuver to direct one clone trooper within medium range. The clone trooper may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to the trooper's next check.
